message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just any commodity; it's a piece of art, a symbol of craftsmanship, and a testament to innovation. I believe its true worth exceeds $15000, but considering my current needs, I am offering it to you at a special price. For a limited time, you have the chance to own this masterpiece for $18000. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this offer further.
